document.masterDocTitle: A taxonomic monograph of the genus Dodomeira Bellò & Baviera, a new genus of Peritelini from Sicily (Coleoptera: Curculionidae: Entiminae)

......continued on the next page According to La Greca (1987) , “ L’istituzione di una sottospecies è una operazione molto più impegnativa che non quella di istituire una specie ”, (The establishment of a subspecies is much more demanding than that of a new species). Therefore we consider all taxa at the species level and, at the same time, consider it appropriate to create informal species-groups. We have grouped the thirty-nine species resulting from the study in eight informal species-groups ( Figures 2A–2H ), largely based on morphological characters and soil type preference. The numbers of species in groups and distribution for each species is in parentheses.

tr.td: Mallorca, Sa Moleta, Nus sa Corbata
